{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$5.2M in 2021-2022** on contracts with TESTFORCE SYSTEMS.

Across 345 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 10 have at least one amendment (3%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 24% and the average number of amendments was 1.3. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$971.0K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.31 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$75.1K. The longest contract was 5.02 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
